page.title: 18Tourism in Plympton St.Mary.
page.content: Devon has a great deal to offer to tourists,{natural beauty,peace and {quiet}and a{good climate.}As such travellers with{caravans}are a common sight (and possible nuisance) during the summer months. Both Battisford and Tuxton farms allow{caravans}on their land,whilst at West Pitten and Smithaleigh{Bed and {Breakfast}is advertised. Smithaleigh also uses 5 acres as a touring{caravan and tent park}and once they install a laundry block they can increase their number from 50 to 100. A{children's farm}nearby shows common farm animals together with cottage industries{Pottery,Weaving and Stained {Glass}and has facilities to provide cream teas. Many farms are themselves an attraction dating back as they do hundreds of years.
